title: CRIME&PUNISHMENT
description: Can be read as a standalone epic or a gripping sequel for fans of the `Master Therion`The Civil War era Super-Agents take on a deadly task as a global threat emerges from the aftermath of the `Master Therion` mystery.Reaching new levels in explaining questions and answers we never even thought existed. A deadly duel off the Carolinas to decide the slave trading divide for centuries is a new ,gripping, feature.As usual,more real-life occult villains than dreamt of in Hogwarts,and no easy broomstick getaways!
author: Paul Camster
